Oficina do antigo grupo de música experimental P.L.A.N, 2006, co-autores; G.A, Leone Soares e Lucas Morais.
Caixa, arame, galão d'agua e grelha de geladeira.

My Life Is Going to Change
Installation and publication (2014)
 

My Life Is Going to Change (2011-15) is an artistic project that has different shapes: (an installation, a workshop, a newspaper, and an artist boogame that makes up the contemporary political imagery.
